h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Transformation Spell Locations
content: In addition to our Walkthrough, below, you can find a list of each of the Transformations in the game, how you can unlock them, as well as a link to a more detailed breakdown of each one via the links. That breakdown includes their movesets and step-by-step guides on where to go to unlock them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Transformation_Spells.md', within the main section titled 'Transformation Spells', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Transformation Spell Locations'.
The content is as follows:
In addition to our Walkthrough, below, you can find a list of each of the Transformations in the game, how you can unlock them, as well as a link to a more detailed breakdown of each one via the links. That breakdown includes their movesets and step-by-step guides on where to go to unlock them.
